ygData.subject: RE: Screaming Terror-New effects
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t tested that either.  I have just assumed that it wouldn t work since the patch said that they sit until they take damage.  Has anyone tested it?  I
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't tested that either. I have just assumed that it wouldn't work
since the patch said that they sit until they take damage. Has anyone
tested it? I want to try the disease type spells. Since they stop the
healing, maybe we can use Disease and ST to keep them status quo while we
med back up.

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 12:19 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror-New effects


From: Aazen1@...

Since ST is now a mez type spell, can you pile all your DOTs onto a
creature,
then mez it and let it just sit there frying?Can't test myself yet, cause I
don't get the spell for 3 more levels . . .

Thanks in advance!
Aazen Sy'Vex

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
